title: is it a bug or :?
body:
hello summoners,
i wanted to ask if someone else has the same thing, I've been Honor LvL 3 for almost 2 months and I get honored almost every game, I'm wondering if there's something weird with my Honor level or it takes a long time to get to higher levels. 
{{sticker:katarina-love}} xo

replies.body:
Hi! This is the Italian board,you must speak Italian there :p
Honestly, regarding your problem, i think is normal if you get honored by your premade: i reach level4 honor playing alone in few weeks and getting honored a lot... So be patient :D
